page.title: 16VILLAGE HALL
page.content: THE VILLAGE HALL WAS COMPLETED AND OPENED IN 1952 AND HAS SINCE BEEN THE CENTRE OF SOCIAL ACTIVITY IN THE COMMUNITY. IT IS REGULARLY USED BY THE WOMEN'S RURAL INTITUTE, BADMINTON CLUB AND BOWLING CLUB. DURING THE SUMMER THERE ARE FREQUENT BARBECUES AND OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES ORGANISED BY A VERY ACTIVE HALL COMMITTEE. THE HALL IS PRIVATELY OWNED AND FINANCED BY THE COMMUNITY. THE SCHOOL HOLDS ITS ANNUAL CHRISTMAS PERFORMANCE THERE AND ALSO ALL SOCIAL OR FUND RAISING EVENTS WHICH OCCUR FROM TIME TO TIME. A NEW KITCHEN HAS BEEN ADDED RECENTLY GIVING THE HALL A SPLENDID NEW FACILITY TO SUPPLEMENT THE LARGE STAGE AND SEATING SPACE IN THE MAIN AREA.
